entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Morden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 p.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
